title: Destination Australia
creator_credit: Film Australia and Australian Institute of Multicultural Affairs
brief_description: A series of eight short programmes examining the role of migration in the development of Australia’s nationhood. The titles are: 1. “From gaol to gentry”. 1788-1840. 2. “The Golden land”. 1840-1900. 3. “Growing pains” 1901-1945. 4. “The Widening net”. 1945 onwards. 5. “White Australia policy”. 6. “Who’ll do the dirty work”. 7. “You keep juggling”. 8. “Foreigners”.
